main event: An unidentified object, resembling a shooting star and smaller than a soccer ball, was observed disappearing rapidly near Kleinostheim, Germany.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 3 seconds., The object was reported to be traveling fast., It is suggested that the object could be a meteorite based on the evidence., A cousin of the witness also observed the phenomenon., The object appeared to have no sound except for a low noise.
sighted object: one small object resembling a shooting star
witness description: A 60-year-old pensioner with experience observing celestial phenomena.
